topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Overview

titlealts.searchtitle: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Overview

body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) is a commercial-grade distribution of OpenStack(R) the leading open source cloud computing platform. This distribution, backed by HPE enables customers to more easily build, manage, and use open-source based hybrid cloud in a resilient, maintainable platform. HPE Helion OpenStack(R) enables cost-effective scalability of IT services and business agility and, as part of the HPE Helion portfolio, it is backed by a wide range of related cloud products, services, and professional support.

HPE Helion OpenStack(R) offers many services based on the different OpenStack(R) projects to provide the functionality you need. Visit the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Services Overview page for a complete list of services.
If you're unfamiliar with what's inside the box, have a look at the components inside HPE Helion OpenStack(R) on the Under the Hood page.
